00020 using namespace MeCab;
00021 
00022 void append_rewrite_rule(RewriteRules *r, char* str) {
00023   char *col[3];
00024   const size_t n = tokenize2(str, " \t", col, 3);
00025   CHECK_DIE(n >= 2) << "format error: " << str;
00026   r->resize(r->size() + 1);
00027   std::string tmp;
00028   if (n >= 3) {
00029     tmp = col[1];
00030     tmp += ' ';
00031     tmp += col[2];
00032     col[1] = const_cast<char *>(tmp.c_str());
00033   }
00034   r->back().set_pattern(col[0], col[1]);
00035 }
00036 
00037 bool match_rewrite_pattern(const char *pat,
00038                            const char *str) {
00039   if (pat[0] == '*' || std::strcmp(pat, str) == 0)
00040     return true;
00041 
00042   size_t len = std::strlen(pat);
00043   if (len >= 3 && pat[0] == '(' && pat[len-1] == ')') {
00044     char buf[BUF_SIZE];
00045     char *col[BUF_SIZE];
00046     CHECK_DIE(len < sizeof(buf) - 3) << "too long parameter";
00047     std::strncpy(buf, pat + 1, BUF_SIZE);
00048     buf[len-2] = '\0';
00049     const size_t n = tokenize(buf, "|", col, sizeof(col));
00050     CHECK_DIE(n < sizeof(col)) << "too long OR nodes";
00051     for (size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00052       if (std::strcmp(str, col[i]) == 0) return true;
00053     }
00054   }
00055   return false;
00056 }
00057 }

00059 namespace MeCab {

00061 bool RewritePattern::set_pattern(const char *src,
00062                                  const char *dst) {
00063   char buf[BUF_SIZE];
00064   spat_.clear();
00065   dpat_.clear();
00066 
00067   std::strncpy(buf, src, sizeof(buf));
00068   tokenizeCSV(buf, back_inserter(spat_), 512);
00069 
00070   std::strncpy(buf, dst, sizeof(buf));
00071   tokenizeCSV(buf, back_inserter(dpat_), 512);
00072 
00073   return (spat_.size() && dpat_.size());
00074 }
00075 
00076 bool RewritePattern::rewrite(size_t size,
00077                              const char **input,
00078                              std::string *output) const {
00079   if (spat_.size() > size) return false;
00080   for (size_t i = 0; i < spat_.size(); ++i) {
00081     if (!match_rewrite_pattern(spat_[i].c_str(), input[i]))
00082       return false;
00083   }
00084 
00085   output->clear();
00086   for (size_t i = 0; i < dpat_.size(); ++i) {
00087     std::string elm;
00088     const char *begin = dpat_[i].c_str();
00089     const char *end = begin + dpat_[i].size();
00090     for (const char *p = begin; p < end; ++p) {
00091       if (*p == '$') {
00092         ++p;
00093         size_t n = 0;
00094         for (; p < end; ++p) {
00095           switch (*p) {
00096             case '0': case '1': case '2': case '3': case '4':
00097             case '5': case '6': case '7': case '8': case '9':
00098               n = 10 * n + (*p - '0');
00099               break;
00100             default:
00101               goto NEXT;
00102           }
00103         }
00104      NEXT:
00105         CHECK_DIE(n > 0 && (n - 1) < size)
00106             << " out of range: [" << dpat_[i] << "] " << n;
00107         elm += input[n - 1];
00108         if (p < end) elm += *p;
00109       } else {
00110         elm += *p;
00111       }
00112     }
00113     CHECK_DIE(escape_csv_element(&elm));
00114     *output += elm;
00115     if (i + 1 != dpat_.size()) *output += ",";
00116   }
00117 
00118   return true;
00119 }
00120 
00121 bool RewriteRules::rewrite(size_t size,
00122                            const char **input,
00123                            std::string *output) const {
00124   for (size_t i = 0; i < this->size(); ++i) {
00125     if ((*this)[i].rewrite(size, input, output))
00126       return true;
00127   }
00128   return false;
00129 }
00130 
00131 void DictionaryRewriter::clear() { cache_.clear(); }
00132 
00133 bool DictionaryRewriter::open(const char *filename,
00134                               Iconv *iconv) {
00135   std::ifstream ifs(filename);
00136   CHECK_DIE(ifs) << "no such file or directory: " << filename;
00137   int append_to = 0;
00138   std::string line;
00139   while (std::getline(ifs, line)) {
00140     if (iconv) iconv->convert(&line);
00141     if (line.empty() || line[0] == '#') continue;
00142     if (line == "[unigram rewrite]") {
00143       append_to = 1;
00144     } else if (line == "[left rewrite]") {
00145       append_to = 2;
00146     } else if (line == "[right rewrite]") {
00147       append_to = 3;
00148     } else {
00149       CHECK_DIE(append_to != 0) << "no sections found";
00150       char *str = const_cast<char *>(line.c_str());
00151       switch (append_to) {
00152         case 1: append_rewrite_rule(&unigram_rewrite_, str); break;
00153         case 2: append_rewrite_rule(&left_rewrite_,    str); break;
00154         case 3: append_rewrite_rule(&right_rewrite_,   str); break;
00155       }
00156     }
00157   }
00158   return true;
00159 }
00160 
00161 // without cache
00162 bool DictionaryRewriter::rewrite(const std::string &feature,
00163                                  std::string *ufeature,
00164                                  std::string *lfeature,
00165                                  std::string *rfeature) const {
00166   char buf[BUF_SIZE];
00167   char *col[BUF_SIZE];
00168   CHECK_DIE(feature.size() < sizeof(buf) - 1) << "too long feature";
00169   std::strncpy(buf, feature.c_str(), sizeof(buf) - 1);
00170   size_t n = tokenizeCSV(buf, col, sizeof(col));
00171   CHECK_DIE(n < sizeof(col)) << "too long CSV entities";
00172   return (unigram_rewrite_.rewrite(n, const_cast<const char **>(col),
00173                                    ufeature) &&
00174           left_rewrite_.rewrite(n, const_cast<const char **>(col),
00175                                 lfeature) &&
00176           right_rewrite_.rewrite(n, const_cast<const char **>(col),
00177                                  rfeature));
00178 }
00179 
00180 // with cache
00181 bool DictionaryRewriter::rewrite2(const std::string &feature,
00182                                   std::string *ufeature,
00183                                   std::string *lfeature,
00184                                   std::string *rfeature) {
00185   std::map<std::string, FeatureSet>::const_iterator it = cache_.find(feature);
00186   if (it == cache_.end()) {
00187     if (!rewrite(feature, ufeature, lfeature, rfeature)) return false;
00188     FeatureSet f;
00189     f.ufeature = *ufeature;
00190     f.lfeature = *lfeature;
00191     f.rfeature = *rfeature;
00192     cache_.insert(std::make_pair<std::string, FeatureSet>(feature, f));
00193   } else {
00194     *ufeature = it->second.ufeature;
00195     *lfeature = it->second.lfeature;
00196     *rfeature = it->second.rfeature;
00197   }
00198 
00199   return true;
00200 }
00201 
00202 bool POSIDGenerator::open(const char *filename,
00203                           Iconv *iconv) {
00204   std::ifstream ifs(filename);
00205   if (!ifs) {
00206     std::cerr << filename
00207               << " is not found. minimum setting is used" << std::endl;
00208     rewrite_.resize(1);
00209     rewrite_.back().set_pattern("*", "1");
00210     return true;
00211   }
00212 
00213   std::string line;
00214   char *col[2];
00215   while (std::getline(ifs, line)) {
00216     if (iconv) iconv->convert(&line);
00217     const size_t n = tokenize2(const_cast<char *>(line.c_str()),
00218                                " \t", col, 2);
00219     CHECK_DIE(n == 2) << "format error: " << line;
00220     for (char *p = col[1]; *p; ++p) {
00221       CHECK_DIE(*p >= '0' && *p <= '9') << "not a number: " << col[1];
00222     }
00223     rewrite_.resize(rewrite_.size() + 1);
00224     rewrite_.back().set_pattern(col[0], col[1]);
00225   }
00226   return true;
00227 }
00228 
00229 int POSIDGenerator::id(const char *feature) const {
00230   char buf[BUF_SIZE];
00231   char *col[BUF_SIZE];
00232   CHECK_DIE(std::strlen(feature) < sizeof(buf) - 1) << "too long feature";
00233   std::strncpy(buf, feature, sizeof(buf) - 1);
00234   const size_t n = tokenizeCSV(buf, col, sizeof(col));
00235   CHECK_DIE(n < sizeof(col)) << "too long CSV entities";
00236   std::string tmp;
00237   if (!rewrite_.rewrite(n, const_cast<const char **>(col), &tmp))
00238     return -1;
00239   return std::atoi(tmp.c_str());
00240 }
00241 }
